name: Ascended Armor Chest
description: Double-click to choose a piece of ascended armor and receive 5 transmutation charges.

name: Bandit Coin Purse
description: Contains a gold coin, luck, a magic find booster, and various bandit supplies. Usable as a bag after opening.

name: Bandit Combat Journal
description: Unlocks the Bandit Weapons Specialist collection.

name: Bandit Skeleton Key
description: Double-click to add a Bandit Skeleton Key to your wallet.

name: Mini Mordrem Husk
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Tarnished Key
description: This key opens a tarnished locked chest in the Silverwastes.

name: Endless Arid Devourer Tonic
description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Endless Dust Mite Tonic
description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Sinister Jewelry Recipe Book
description: Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Sinister stat combination.

name: Bandit Cache
description: Contains a rare bandit weapon, bandit crests, and other supplies.

name: Ogden's Gratitude
description: Contains rare gear, tomes of knowledge, obsidian shards, and various gemstones.

name: Luminescent Gloves Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any gloves.

name: Luminescent Leggings Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any leggings.

name: Luminescent Helm Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any headgear.

name: Luminescent Coat Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any chest armor.

name: Luminescent Boots Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any boots.

name: Luminescent Shoulders Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any shoulder armor.

name: Carapace Boot Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Carapace Shoulder Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Sinister Weapon Recipe Book
description: Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Sinister stat combination.

name: Sinister Armor Recipe Book
description: Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Sinister stat combination.

name: Endless Arid Devourer Tonic
description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Imbued Beetle Shell
description:
Created by imbuing beetle remains from Dry Top at an underground pollen cloud in the Silverwastes.
This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Luminescent Laces
description:
Obtained by proving your perseverance (stack size: 3) to Silverwastes quartermasters.
This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Luminescent Strap
description:
Obtained by proving your perseverance (stack size: 3) to Silverwastes quartermasters.
This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Imbued Firefly Luminescence
description:
Created by imbuing firefly luminescence from Caledon Forest at an underground pollen cloud in the Silverwastes.
This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Mordrem Toxin Gland
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Mordrem Thrasher Tendon
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Mordrem Teragriff Tendon
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Mordrem Husk Tendon
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Experimental Mordrem Extraction Device
description:
Double-click to gain the ability to extract valuable parts from underground Mordrem bosses.
Only one extraction effect may be active at a time.

details.name: Mordrem Dissector
details.description: Help kill a Mordrem boss to collect its organs.

name: Mordrem Troll Spleen
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Mordrem Thrasher Spleen
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Mordrem Teragriff Spleen
description:

name: Mordrem Husk Spleen
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Mordrem Heart
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Silverwastes Shovel
description: Double-click to equip a shovel specially designed for finding lost bandit chests in the Silverwastes. Use bandit skeleton keys to unlock the chests. <c=@warning>Single-use item.</c>

name: Verata's Sinister Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Condition Damage, +Power, and +Precision.

name: Sinister Orichalcum Imbued Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Condition Damage, +Power, and +Precision.

name: Sinister Intricate Gossamer Insignia
description: Used in the crafting of armor with +Condition Damage, +Power, and +Precision.

name: Sheet of Charged Ambrite
description: Refined from ambrite and charged quartz.

name: Verata's Sinister Insignia
description: Used in the crafting of armor with +Condition Damage, +Power, and +Precision.

name: Pact Airship Balloon
description: Double-click to pull out a festive balloon.

details.name: Celebration Bonus
details.description:
100% boost to magic find, WvW rank gain, experience from kills, and gold from kills.
10% bonus to PvP and WvW reward track progress.

name: Mini Belinda Delaqua
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Sand Giant
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Pact Airship
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Drooburt's Ghost
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Avatar of the Tree
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Basic Cloth Rack
description: This activates a basic cloth rack within your home instance for daily gathering.

name: Wintersday Greatsword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

name: Set of 3 Gather-r-Tron Tools
description:
Contains:
Log-r-Tron Permanent Logging Tool
Mine-r-Tron Permanent Mining Tool
Reap-r-Tron Permanent Harvesting Tool

name: Glint's Gaze Mask
description: Double-click to imbue another helmet item's stats into this appearance (one-time ability).

name: Permanent Chickenado Finisher
description: Summon the fearsome Chickenado to finish off your foes!

name: Exalted Mail Courier
description: Unlocks the ability for characters on your account to customize the way they send mail to other players and receive game mail.

name: Arctic Explorer Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Wintersday Focus Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

name: Wintersday Scepter Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.

name: Wintersday Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Wintersday Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Wintersday Sword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Wintersday Staff Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

name: Wintersday Pistol Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Wintersday Mace Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

name: Wintersday Torch Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other torch.

name: Wintersday Longbow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Wintersday Hammer Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

name: Aviator's Memory Box
description:
This fun inventory item spawns a box for everyone to use. Interacting with the box causes everything you see to appear in film grain and extends your arms so you're ready for takeoff!
This item has infinite uses.

Cannot be used in PvP, WvW, or dungeons. Adding this item to your wardrobe may slightly adjust its functionality.

name: Wintersday Short Bow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Wintersday Warhorn Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other warhorn.

name: Wintersday Axe Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Wintersday Dagger Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: Shoulder Scarf
description:
This will replace the appearance of one shoulder armor of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This shoulder skin has no stats of its own.

name: Immortal Weapon Choice
description: Each weapon case contains a single Immortal weapon skin of your choice to unlock for your account.

name: Caithe's Remorse
description:
"I will bear your pain."
—Caithe

name: Quetzal Crest
description: <c=@flavor>Etched on the back are the words, "We are not so easily fooled."</c>

name: Caithe's Blossom
description:
"I'm done with your games, and I'm finished with you. I am not your dearheart."
—Caithe

name: Ventari's Chisel
description:
<c=@flavor>"Never leave a wrong to ripen into evil or sorrow."</c>
—Tenets of Ventari

name: Wynne's Locket
description:
"I go where I please, and just now it pleases me to stay among friends."
—Wynne

name: Ogden's Ankh
description:
<c=@flavor>"We all die. Some sooner than others."</c>
—Ogden Stonehealer

name: Jurah's Jewel
description:
"Victory does not go to the loudest, but to the most effective."
—Master of Whispers

name: Aspect Amulet
description:
<c=@flavor>"The summer sun shone bright once more, warmed wood and cloth of home."</c>
—Zephyrite Song

name: Mysterious Elixir
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point. .
The sparkling vial brims with power.

name: Fragrant Cactus Fruit
description:
Double-click to gain a hero point.
The wrinkled fruit smells sweet and earthy.

name: Superior Rune of the Defender
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Maximum Health; heal for 5% of your maximum health after blocking an attack. (Cooldown: 1 Second)

name: Superior Sigil of Blight
description:
Element: Pain
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
Inflict nearby enemies with 2 stacks of poison for 4 seconds upon landing a critical hit.
(Cooldown: 8 Seconds)

name: Exquisite Charged Ambrite Jewel
description: Double-click to apply to an accessory, amulet, or ring with an unused upgrade slot.

name: Key of Greater Nightmares
description: Used to open a greater nightmare pod in the Silverwastes. The chest is located at the heart of the Hidden Depths.

name: The Master of Peace's Bequest
description: Contains rare gear, obsidian shards, and a choice of a pair of carapace gloves.

name: Essence of Nightmares
description: Combine 25 essences with a Bandit Skeleton Key to create a Key of Greater Nightmares.

name: Fresh Plant Material
description:
This is perfect for creating Solus the Outlier's vegetable oil.
